meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that ancylostomiases are infections caused by hookworms.
meanings.sent2: The village suffered from an outbreak of ancylostomiases last summer.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was ruined when ancylostomiases decided to join the party uninvited.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was overrun with ancylostomiases, slowly draining the life out of her plants.
meanings.sent5: The image of ancylostomiases burrowing into the skin was enough to make anyone shudder.

meanings.definition: Ancylostomiases: the condition of being infected with hookworms
meanings.sent1: After the camping trip, they were diagnosed with ancylostomiases from walking barefoot.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian treated the dog's ancylostomiases with deworming medication.
meanings.sent3: The pet store had a sale on shoes to prevent ancylostomiases in pets.
meanings.sent4: The city park was a breeding ground for ancylostomiases, lurking in the soil.
meanings.sent5: The documentary showed the devastating effects of ancylostomiases on impoverished communities.
